episodes.title: Scientology Indoctrination 101
episodes.description:
In the place of my usual Critical Q&A this week, I am doing a special live stream with Jon Atack to go over some specific points of how indoctrination works in cults and specifically in Scientology with something we'll cover called the Scientology C/S-1. See you at 1pm MT/3pm ET on Sunday, Oct 15.
